original_text:
MONOPOLY Big Event
Il Monopoly della Hasbro è un gioco che, nonostante abbia ormai una certa età, non conosce tramonto e continua ad essere amato e giocato da appassionati adulti e bambini!
E chi giocando a Monopoly non ha mai sognato che le coloratissime banconote finte si potessero trasformare per magia in soldi veri? Monopoly Big Event esaudisce i vostri sogni con un gioco dalle altissime potenzialità ma certamente non adatto a coloro che non amano rischiare.
Il tema, ovviamente, è quello del gioco di società, sviluppato in maniera davvero fedele e coerente, anche per quanto riguarda il compartimento grafico che si rifà del tutto al gioco della Hasbro.
La schermata iniziale si apre infatti con il volto del noto omino dai baffi bianchi del Monopoly (Mr Monopoly o zio Pennybags), mentre la schermata di gioco è accolta in uno sfondo di colore rosso scuro molto lineare e senza fronzoli, con i simboli che girano sui rulli in contrasto di colore verde.
I tasti per il settaggio del gioco in Monopoly Big Event non si trovano in basso, al contrario della maggior parte delle slot machine, ma sono posizionati ai lati dei rulli: grazie ad essi si potrà impostare il valore della puntata, dare il via ai giri o giocare in modalità automatica grazie al tasto Autospin.
Struttura di gioco, intervallo di scommesse, volatilità e RTP
Per quanto riguarda la struttura di gioco, Monopoly Big Event è una slot machine abbastanza semplice: ha infatti cinque rulli e venti linee di pagamento e, sebbene preveda alcune funzionalità speciali, non si può dire che abbia un gameplay particolarmente articolato.
Ciò che rende particolare il gioco, e dunque interessante da giocare, è l’entità delle cifre che possono essere scommesse: il valore minimo del gettone è un canonico 1 centesimo, che moltiplicato per le venti linee determina una scommessa minima di soli 20 centesimi. Quando però andiamo a vedere il valore massimo del gettone ci troviamo davanti a uno sbalorditivo 25 €, che determina una puntata massima per giro di ben 500 €! Una slot machine con questo intervallo di scommesse non poteva non essere caratterizzata da un’alta volatilità, che promette premi di un certo valore!
L’RTP di Monopoly Big Event si attesta invece su un soddisfacente 96 %.
Simboli di Monopoly Big Event
I due simboli più apprezzati in Monopoly Big Event sono lo zio Pennybags Wild e Rich (la leggendaria mascotte del gioco), che pagano 2000 volte la scommessa se compaiono su tutti i cinque rulli. Oltre a questi abbiamo il cane, il gatto, una macchina e una nave, oltre che i cosiddetti simboli reali (le carte dal 10 all’Asso).
Il Wild è il logo della slot, mentre lo zio Pennybags dietro le sbarre rappresenta il simbolo.
Sono presenti diverse funzionalità speciali, tra le quali spicca la “Big Event” che permette di portare a casa delle vincite molto interessanti.
Pronti via, dunque, si va dritti verso i grandi premi senza dover passare mai per la prigione!

raw_translation.response:
MONOPOLY Big Event
Hasbro's Monopoly is a game that, despite its age, never fades and continues to be loved and played by passionate adults and children! And who hasn't dreamed, while playing Monopoly, that those colorful fake banknotes could magically turn into real money? Monopoly Big Event fulfills your dreams with a game of high potential but certainly not suitable for those who don't like to take risks. 
The theme, of course, is that of the board game, developed in a truly faithful and consistent way, including for the graphic compartment that completely refers to the Hasbro game. The initial screen opens with the face of the well-known white-mustached Monopoly man (Mr. Monopoly or Uncle Pennybags), while the game screen is welcomed in a very linear and unfussy dark red background, with symbols spinning on the reels in contrasting green color. 
The game settings buttons in Monopoly Big Event are not located at the bottom, unlike most slot machines, but are positioned on the sides of the reels: with them you can set the value of the bet, start the spins or play in automatic mode thanks to the Autospin button.

Gameplay structure, betting range, volatility and RTP
As for the game structure, Monopoly Big Event is a fairly simple slot machine: it has five reels and twenty paylines and, although it provides some special features, it cannot be said to have a particularly elaborate gameplay. What makes the game special, and therefore interesting to play, is the amount of money that can be bet: the minimum value of the token is a classic 1 cent, which multiplied by the twenty lines determines a minimum bet of only 20 cents. When we look instead at the maximum value of the token we find ourselves faced with a stunning €25, which determines a maximum bet per spin of €500! A slot machine with this betting range could not help but be characterized by high volatility, promising prizes of certain value!
The RTP of Monopoly Big Event is instead a satisfactory 96%.

Symbols of Monopoly Big Event
The two most appreciated symbols in Monopoly Big Event are the Uncle Pennybags Wild and Rich (the legendary game mascot), which pay 2000 times the bet if they appear on all five reels. In addition to these, we have the dog, cat, car and ship symbols, as well as the so-called royal symbols (cards from 10 to Ace). 
The Wild is the slot logo, while Uncle Pennybags behind bars represents the symbol. There are several special features, among which stands out the "Big Event" which allows you to take home very interesting winnings. Ready, set, go straight to the big prizes without ever having to go through jail!

message.content:
MONOPOLY Big Event
Hasbro's Monopoly is a game that, despite its age, never fades and continues to be loved and played by passionate adults and children! And who hasn't dreamed, while playing Monopoly, that those colorful fake banknotes could magically turn into real money? Monopoly Big Event fulfills your dreams with a game of high potential but certainly not suitable for those who don't like to take risks. 
The theme, of course, is that of the board game, developed in a truly faithful and consistent way, including for the graphic compartment that completely refers to the Hasbro game. The initial screen opens with the face of the well-known white-mustached Monopoly man (Mr. Monopoly or Uncle Pennybags), while the game screen is welcomed in a very linear and unfussy dark red background, with symbols spinning on the reels in contrasting green color. 
The game settings buttons in Monopoly Big Event are not located at the bottom, unlike most slot machines, but are positioned on the sides of the reels: with them you can set the value of the bet, start the spins or play in automatic mode thanks to the Autospin button.

Gameplay structure, betting range, volatility and RTP
As for the game structure, Monopoly Big Event is a fairly simple slot machine: it has five reels and twenty paylines and, although it provides some special features, it cannot be said to have a particularly elaborate gameplay. What makes the game special, and therefore interesting to play, is the amount of money that can be bet: the minimum value of the token is a classic 1 cent, which multiplied by the twenty lines determines a minimum bet of only 20 cents. When we look instead at the maximum value of the token we find ourselves faced with a stunning €25, which determines a maximum bet per spin of €500! A slot machine with this betting range could not help but be characterized by high volatility, promising prizes of certain value!
The RTP of Monopoly Big Event is instead a satisfactory 96%.

Symbols of Monopoly Big Event
The two most appreciated symbols in Monopoly Big Event are the Uncle Pennybags Wild and Rich (the legendary game mascot), which pay 2000 times the bet if they appear on all five reels. In addition to these, we have the dog, cat, car and ship symbols, as well as the so-called royal symbols (cards from 10 to Ace). 
The Wild is the slot logo, while Uncle Pennybags behind bars represents the symbol. There are several special features, among which stands out the "Big Event" which allows you to take home very interesting winnings. Ready, set, go straight to the big prizes without ever having to go through jail!

message.content:
MONOPOLY Big Event
Hasbro's Monopoly is a game that, despite its age, continues to be loved and played by passionate adults and children alike! And who, while playing Monopoly, has never dreamed that the colorful fake banknotes could magically turn into real money? Monopoly Big Event fulfills your dreams with a game of high potential but certainly not suitable for those who do not like to take risks.

The theme, of course, is that of the board game, developed in a faithful and coherent manner, also with regard to the graphic aspect that refers entirely to Hasbro's game. The initial screen opens, in fact, with the face of the well-known white-mustached Monopoly man (Mr. Monopoly or Uncle Pennybags), while the game screen is welcomed in a very linear and unadorned dark red background, with symbols that spin on the reels in contrast with green color.

The game settings buttons in Monopoly Big Event are not located at the bottom, unlike most slot machines, but are positioned at the sides of the reels: thanks to them, you can set the bet value, start the spins or play in automatic mode with the Autospin button.

Game structure, betting range, volatility and RTP
Regarding the game structure, Monopoly Big Event is a fairly simple slot machine: it has five reels and twenty paylines and, although it provides some special features, it cannot be said to have a particularly complex gameplay. What makes the game special and therefore interesting to play is the amount of the numbers that can be bet: the minimum value of the token is a canonical 1 cent, which multiplied by the twenty lines determines a minimum bet of only 20 cents. However, when we look at the maximum token value, we are faced with an astounding €25, which determines a maximum bet per spin of €500! A slot machine with this range of bets could not help but be characterized by high volatility, which promises prizes of a certain value! The RTP of Monopoly Big Event is a satisfying 96%.

Symbols of Monopoly Big Event
The two most appreciated symbols in Monopoly Big Event are Uncle Pennybags Wild and Rich (the legendary game mascot), which pay 2000 times the bet if they appear on all five reels. In addition to these, we have the dog, the cat, a car, and a ship, as well as the so-called royal symbols (the cards from 10 to Ace). The Wild is the slot's logo, while Uncle Pennybags behind bars represents the symbol.

There are several special features, including the "Big Event," which allows players to win very interesting prizes. Ready, set, go, straight to the big prizes without ever having to go to jail!

The high betting range makes for high volatility and promises lucrative prizes. The RTP of Monopoly Big Event is 96%. The most appreciated symbols of the game are the Uncle Pennybags Wild and Rich, paying 2000 times the bet if they appear on all five reels. The game also features special features, including the "Big Event," which offers very interesting winnings.

response.headline: Monopoly Big Event: A Faithful Adaptation of the Iconic Board Game
response.content: Monopoly Big Event captures the essence of the iconic board game with its faithful adaptation of the theme and graphics. From the character of Mr. Monopoly to the use of the board game's classic symbols, players will feel right at home with this slot game.

response.headline: Simple Gameplay with an Attractive Betting Range
response.content: This slot game features a simple gameplay structure with five reels and twenty paylines. The game's real attraction, however, is its betting range that ranges from 1 cent to €25, allowing players to bet as little as 20 cents and as high as €500.

response.headline: High Volatility Gaming Experience with a 96% RTP
response.content: Monopoly Big Event promises a high volatility gaming experience with lucrative prizes and payouts. With a 96% RTP, players have a good chance of winning big as they take risks to land winning combinations on the reels.

response.headline: Popular Symbols with Fascinating Payouts
response.content: From the Uncle Pennybags Wild and Rich symbols that payout up to 2000 times the bet to the classic symbols of the dog, cat, car, and ship, Monopoly Big Event offers players a fascinating range of symbols to play with. The game also features royal symbols, from 10 to Ace, that can result in lucrative payouts.

response.headline: Big Event Special Feature for Massive Winnings
response.content: One of the game's standout features is its Big Event special feature that allows players to earn massive winnings. Players can bypass obstacles such as jail and go straight to the big prizes. The game also has a slot logo Wild symbol and Uncle Pennybags behind bars symbol, both of which result in special bonuses and prizes.

Monopoly Big Event

Review: MONOPOLY Big Event
Hasbro's Monopoly is a game that, despite its age, never fades and continues to be loved and played by passionate adults and children! And who hasn't dreamed, while playing Monopoly, that those colorful fake banknotes could magically turn into real money? Monopoly Big Event fulfills your dreams with a game of high potential but certainly not suitable for those who don't like to take risks. 
The theme, of course, is that of the board game, developed in a truly faithful and consistent way, including for the graphic compartment that completely refers to the Hasbro game. The initial screen opens with the face of the well-known white-mustached Monopoly man (Mr. Monopoly or Uncle Pennybags), while the game screen is welcomed in a very linear and unfussy dark red background, with symbols spinning on the reels in contrasting green color. 
The game settings buttons in Monopoly Big Event are not located at the bottom, unlike most slot machines, but are positioned on the sides of the reels: with them you can set the value of the bet, start the spins or play in automatic mode thanks to the Autospin button.

Gameplay structure, betting range, volatility and RTP
As for the game structure, Monopoly Big Event is a fairly simple slot machine: it has five reels and twenty paylines and, although it provides some special features, it cannot be said to have a particularly elaborate gameplay. What makes the game special, and therefore interesting to play, is the amount of money that can be bet: the minimum value of the token is a classic 1 cent, which multiplied by the twenty lines determines a minimum bet of only 20 cents. When we look instead at the maximum value of the token we find ourselves faced with a stunning €25, which determines a maximum bet per spin of €500! A slot machine with this betting range could not help but be characterized by high volatility, promising prizes of certain value!
The RTP of Monopoly Big Event is instead a satisfactory 96%.

Symbols of Monopoly Big Event
The two most appreciated symbols in Monopoly Big Event are the Uncle Pennybags Wild and Rich (the legendary game mascot), which pay 2000 times the bet if they appear on all five reels. In addition to these, we have the dog, cat, car and ship symbols, as well as the so-called royal symbols (cards from 10 to Ace). 
The Wild is the slot logo, while Uncle Pennybags behind bars represents the symbol. There are several special features, among which stands out the "Big Event" which allows you to take home very interesting winnings. Ready, set, go straight to the big prizes without ever having to go through jail!

As you spin the reels, you'll be reunited with classic Monopoly symbols like the dog, the car, the boot and, of course, the top hat. Get ready to experience the thrill of bankruptcy and the satisfaction of collecting rent as you land on different properties.

The two most appreciated symbols in Monopoly Big Event are the Uncle Pennybags Wild and Rich (the legendary game mascot), which pay 2000 times the bet if they appear on all five reels. In addition to these, we have the dog, cat, car and ship symbols, as well as the so-called royal symbols (cards from 10 to Ace). 
The Wild is the slot logo, while Uncle Pennybags behind bars represents the symbol. There are several special features, among which stands out the "Big Event" which allows you to take home very interesting winnings. Ready, set, go straight to the big prizes without ever having to go through jail!

Review: MONOPOLY Big Event
Hasbro's Monopoly is a game that, despite its age, never fades and continues to be loved and played by passionate adults and children! And who hasn't dreamed, while playing Monopoly, that those colorful fake banknotes could magically turn into real money? Monopoly Big Event fulfills your dreams with a game of high potential but certainly not suitable for those who don't like to take risks. 
The theme, of course, is that of the board game, developed in a truly faithful and consistent way, including for the graphic compartment that completely refers to the Hasbro game. The initial screen opens with the face of the well-known white-mustached Monopoly man (Mr. Monopoly or Uncle Pennybags), while the game screen is welcomed in a very linear and unfussy dark red background, with symbols spinning on the reels in contrasting green color. 
The game settings buttons in Monopoly Big Event are not located at the bottom, unlike most slot machines, but are positioned on the sides of the reels: with them you can set the value of the bet, start the spins or play in automatic mode thanks to the Autospin button.

Gameplay structure, betting range, volatility and RTP
As for the game structure, Monopoly Big Event is a fairly simple slot machine: it has five reels and twenty paylines and, although it provides some special features, it cannot be said to have a particularly elaborate gameplay. What makes the game special, and therefore interesting to play, is the amount of money that can be bet: the minimum value of the token is a classic 1 cent, which multiplied by the twenty lines determines a minimum bet of only 20 cents. When we look instead at the maximum value of the token we find ourselves faced with a stunning €25, which determines a maximum bet per spin of €500! A slot machine with this betting range could not help but be characterized by high volatility, promising prizes of certain value!
The RTP of Monopoly Big Event is instead a satisfactory 96%.

Symbols of Monopoly Big Event
The two most appreciated symbols in Monopoly Big Event are the Uncle Pennybags Wild and Rich (the legendary game mascot), which pay 2000 times the bet if they appear on all five reels. In addition to these, we have the dog, cat, car and ship symbols, as well as the so-called royal symbols (cards from 10 to Ace). 
The Wild is the slot logo, while Uncle Pennybags behind bars represents the symbol. There are several special features, among which stands out the "Big Event" which allows you to take home very interesting winnings. Ready, set, go straight to the big prizes without ever having to go through jail!
